Title: Relates to notification and hearings for proposed construction or removal of bicycle lanes or racks
Summary: Relates to notification and hearings for proposed construction or removal of bicycle lanes or racks; requires a presentation at a public hearing when the department of transportation proposes to construct or remove a bicycle lane or rack; defines terms.
LawCode: Add ยง19-159.7, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to notification and hearings for proposed construction or removal of bicycle lanes or racks
